Text.Page:
We don't have much time, so let me get right to it.

Kunchara told you he turned the kulkari with a spell. Well, he did cast a spell, but it didn't do the damage he thinks it did.

As with too many things, blame falls to the cultists."But Tukarus..."

Tukarus thought the same thing Kunchara did, but they were both wrong. I can't explain right now, but trust me.

To make this right, I need blood from {@LinkCreature:18#21#Lokian skullcleavers} and {@LinkCreature:18#22#priests}.

I'll fill you in on the rest when you get back.

This is exactly what I needed. Thank you.

The explanation? Oh, no. I'm still far too busy. Another time, though. Really.
The longer you stand here, the more the cultists can advance their plots.
